H0.text: The OK Corral is in which US town. Prescott

H1.text: The OK Corral is in which US town. Flagstaff

H2.text: The OK Corral is in which US town. Bisbee

H3.text: The OK Corral is in which US town. Tombstone

A4.text: The gunfight at the O.K. Corral took place in the town of Tombstone in Arizona Territory.

A5.text: Taking place in the town of Tombstone in Arizona Territory, the battle has become one archetype of the American Old West.
